site.title: Carmine Fantarella (Portfolio)
site.description: Carmine is a Software Developer and Game Programming Teacher. A list of his published work can be found here and under his business website Games Of Edan.

elements.innerHtml:
ABOUT ME

I'm an experienced Australian software developer, specialising in C++, C#, using tools including Visual Studio, Unity and UE4. I'm an enthusiastic programming teacher at Academy of Interactive Entertainment. I've successfully deployed games to online Stores including Steam. In the past, I've designed & developed standalone 3D Engines using open source libraries, developed Client Management software & created Signal Processing Tools for data analysis. I have 20+ years of experience as a Software Developer with small teams and large organisations, and worked in industries including Defence, Security & Games.
~ Preview ~

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Game Programming Teacher and Tutor  [ AIE, 2018 - Present ]

  • Deliver programming coursework and tutoring to adult learners, specialising in C# & C++ languages
  • Monitor and advise students on coursework, technical, industry and career matters
  • Implement new curriculum content and delivery methods
  • Collaborate with team members to deliver coursework
  • Maintain relationships with industry professionals
  • Deliver face-to-face & online training using industry technologies including Visual Studio, Unity, UE4, VR, git
  • Participate in career events including Open Days & Industry Experience Days


Independent Game Developer  [ GAMES OF EDAN,  2014 - Present ]

  • Design & develop C# applications in  Unity (e.g. ICEBOX:Speedgunner )
  • Design & develop C++ / Blueprints applications in UE4, (e.g. Smashtris )
  • Software Architect software systems using both Object Oriented & ECS principles
  • Apply innovative programming techniques, including procedural level generation & music, multi-threaded AI
  • Design & develop aesthetics, environments, characters, narratives, sound design for games
  • Collaborate with industry personnel including voice artists, testers and game designers


Software Developer  [ CAPRICORN 76 PTY. LTD.,  2003 - Present ]

  • Developed the Glint 3D Engine using C++, Lua and Open Source libraries 
  • Published ICEBOX: Speedgunner to Steam & other online portals
  • Researched and obtained trademarks via IP Australia


Systems Software Engineer  [ INTELLIGENT SW DEV,  2009 - 2010 ]

  • Software Architect distributed software systems to conduct Agent-Based Simulations
  • Developed and deployed simulations of complex human-centric behaviours for prediction and analysis
  • Apply C++, Lua programming languages to develop custom distributed software solutions
  • Apply version control technologies including git and cloud services


Software Contractor  [ BRITISH AEROSPACE,  2003 ]

  • Assisted existing team on code redesigns & refactoring
  • Software Architect new modules for integration into existing codebase
  • Apply C++ programming languages to develop software solutions
  • Use software development technologies including Rational Rose products


Senior Software Engineer  [ tENIX,  2001 - 2003 ]

Work in software team developing Ground Surveillance Radar training systemSoftware Architect networking solutions for 

Used in a classroom environment as a teaching device


Professional Officer  [ DSTO,  1997 - 2001 ]

Developed Software to facilitate Data Collection and Analysis. Worked on Inverse Synthetic Aperture Radar Signal Processing. Published works about ISARLAB signal processing software.

EDUCATION  &  QUALIFICATIONS

  • Bachelor of Engineering (Electrical and Electronic) with 1st Class Honours, University of Adelaide, Graduated 1996
  • Cert IV TAE41006 Training & Assessment, Graduated 2019
  • Unity Certified Programmer, Graduated 2020
  • Mental Health First Aider, Completed 2020
  • Middle Manager Course, Alison Online, Completed 2021
  • Principles of Management Course, Alison Online, Completed 2021

CONTACT

[Email] carmine@capricorn76.com

[Twitter] @CFantarella

[LinkedIn] carmine-fantarella-aus

Adelaide, Australia
